categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Ottegan Leader was the leader of an Ottegan enclave on the planet Arthon. After the enclave assisted the explorer Lor San Tekka with mapping the location of lost Jedi Master Luke Skywalker, the Resistance attempted to evacuate the Ottegans. The transport holding the leader was shot down by Kylo Ren of the First Order, who captured and interrogated him for San Tekka's location.
